title: Fair Pricing

title: Ingesting PDFs and why Gemini 2.0 changes everything

title: Tell HN: Cloudflare is blocking Pale Moon and other non-mainstream browsers

aiHeadline: Outrage Alert: Cloudflare is Blocking Pale Moon and Other Non-Mainstream Browsers, Because Apparently Being Different is a Crime, and Now Users Are Left to Wonder What They Did to Deserve Such Treatment, Is This the End of Browser Diversity as We Know It, or Just a Big Mishap?
